entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Otherwise clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
